author: rooneg
msg: (print_dirents): remove the URL argument, and stop printing the URL out
for the directory.  it made little sense since the user obviously knows

(svn ls): update examples as 'svn ls' no longer prints out the URL.

to svn_path_compare_paths_nts.  pointed out by Philip Martin.
